result.reason: Resize logic includes a 300ms debounce and potentially slow fallback to Reconnect() which can be optimized.
result.approach: Analyze RdpProtocol8.cs to potentially lower the 300ms resize debounce. Investigate RdpProtocol9.cs to ensure UpdateSessionDisplaySettings is used correctly and minimize fallbacks to the slower Reconnect() method.
